p: Notifications were originally per month, for every year over the period 2007–2012 (see Data accessibility3 for details). We estimated index P per day in the period 2007–2012, and then calculated mean P for each of the 12 months across those years. We also calculated the mean of dengue notified cases for each of the 12 months across those years. By averaging across 5 years, we aimed at quantifying suitability into what can be termed a typical year that is the expected average monthly suitability of each city in any year.
